author: ianna
body:
* Correct translation of TECPpConnectors in Z using its own half width:
```
diff Geometry/TrackerCommonData/data/Run3/trackerbulkhead.xml Geometry/TrackerCommonData/data/trackerbulkhead.xml
180c180
<    <Translation x="[PatchpanelR2]+0.5*[PpConnectorsLength]+[PpBoxSideX]" y="-0.5*[PpBoxWidth]-[PpBoxSideY]" z="-0.5*[PatchpanelThick]+0.5*[PpConnectorsThick]"/>
---
>    <Translation x="[PatchpanelR2]+0.5*[PpConnectorsLength]+[PpBoxSideX]" y="-0.5*[PpBoxWidth]-[PpBoxSideY]" z="-0.5*[PatchpanelThick]+0.5*[PpBoxThick]"/>
185c185
<    <Translation x="[PatchpanelR2]+[PpConnectorsLength]+[PpBoxLengthL]+0.5*[PpConnectorsLength]+[PpBoxSideX]" y="-0.5*[PpBoxWidth]-[PpBoxSideY]" z="-0.5*[PatchpanelThick]+0.5*[PpConnectorsThick]"/>
---
>    <Translation x="[PatchpanelR2]+[PpConnectorsLength]+[PpBoxLengthL]+0.5*[PpConnectorsLength]+[PpBoxSideX]" y="-0.5*[PpBoxWidth]-[PpBoxSideY]" z="-0.5*[PatchpanelThick]+0.5*[PpBoxThick]"/>
190c190
<    <Translation x="[PatchpanelR2]+0.5*[PpConnectorsLength]+[PpBoxSideX]-[PpBoxDistX]" y="-1.5*[PpBoxWidth]-[PpBoxSideY]-[PpBoxDistY]" z="-0.5*[PatchpanelThick]+0.5*[PpConnectorsThick]"/>
---
>    <Translation x="[PatchpanelR2]+0.5*[PpConnectorsLength]+[PpBoxSideX]-[PpBoxDistX]" y="-1.5*[PpBoxWidth]-[PpBoxSideY]-[PpBoxDistY]" z="-0.5*[PatchpanelThick]+0.5*[PpBoxThick]"/>
195c195
<    <Translation x="[PatchpanelR2]+[PpConnectorsLength]+[PpBoxLengthL]+0.5*[PpConnectorsLength]+[PpBoxSideX]-[PpBoxDistX]" y="-1.5*[PpBoxWidth]-[PpBoxSideY]-[PpBoxDistY]" z="-0.5*[PatchpanelThick]+0.5*[PpConnectorsThick]"/>
---
>    <Translation x="[PatchpanelR2]+[PpConnectorsLength]+[PpBoxLengthL]+0.5*[PpConnectorsLength]+[PpBoxSideX]-[PpBoxDistX]" y="-1.5*[PpBoxWidth]-[PpBoxSideY]-[PpBoxDistY]" z="-0.5*[PatchpanelThick]+0.5*[PpBoxThick]"/>
```
* Copy the xml file as a separate Run 3 copy to avoid backward geometry changes

There are no changes in other volumes, nor material budget. See the screenshots: before and after the fix, and full children tree in its mother volume :
